name: Poké Merge
description:
A Pokémon themed merge game How to play:
  • Drag and drop two items onto each other to "merge" them into the next tier.
  • Click generators with a lightning bolt to generate new items.

Original prototype made during September 2021, as seen in the screenshots. Currently rewriting the project as of January 2023. Save is temporarily disabled and the project is in shambles. Any feedback is appreciated.

Sprites used:
  • Pokemon Shuffle, https://www.spriters-resource.com/
  • Pokemon Dream World, https://archives.bulbagarden.net/
  • Various Pokémon 3D models, https://www.models-resource.com/

All credits goes to Nintendo. I just want a free merge game without ads.
